pic1_alt: Histogram of overall count of artists in Gardner's Art Through the Ages from 1925 to 2022, n=2325. There are 6 data points between 1925 and 1975, with 21, 50, 60, 87, 69 and 85 counts. Counts rise after 1975 to approximately 150 in the 1990s, and then 170 to 182 after 2000.
pic2_alt: Histogram of the gender of artists in Gardner's Art Through the Ages from 1925 to 2022, n=2325. Artist gender is Female or Male. 100% are male in 1925, between 97% and 99% in 1930 to 1975, 95% in 1980, then a linearly decreasing percent of males until 2022, when the percent of males is 88%.
